name: Database Crawler
text: A text based game that uses sequelize to store all persistent data.

name: Project Tantalus
text: A website that uses apis to help you find something to eat.

name: Employee Directory
text: A website that uses react to organize and allow searches in randomly generated test users.

name: Weather Dashboard
text: A website that uses the openweather api to allow you to see the weather in a city by searching for it.

name: Exercise Tracker
text: An exercise tracker that allows a user to save workouts comprised of several exercises and see stats for their recent workouts.

name: Note Taker
text: An application that allows a user to take, delete, and view notes. Data persists between visits.
